oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Text is followed by biographical accounts of Nūr Jahān Baygum and Zīb al-Nisā Baygum (ff. 11v-14r).
Copied in the hand of Aḥmad on March 20, 1849 for an American named Idavārd Hāl Ṣāḥib (Edward Hall?) (ff. 11r).
MS Persian 92. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
